abstract: Memphis man Lorenzo Clark is charged as convicted felon in possession of a handgun after he fatally shoots his neighbor, Police Officer Terence Olridge, who was off-duty when he died.
lead_paragraph: A neighbor was charged on Monday with felony possession of a handgun in the killing of a Memphis police officer.

headline.main: Tennessee: Off-Duty Officer Killed in Gunfight With Neighbor
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Off-Duty Officer Killed in Gunfight With Neighbor

snippet: A neighbor was charged on Monday with felony possession of a handgun in the killing of a Memphis police officer.
